channel.title: Ownage plz ftw =) *Answered*
channel.description: Ok, I have done this before, but I must be forgeting something because I just cant get the damn thing to work. I believe you edit the item2 and item3, but not positive. If somone could please post, and give me an example of adding a random drop to an npc it would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Ownage plz ftw =) *Answered*
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

In item.java item2.java or item3.java add …

[code]public static int NAME[] = {//item id’s};

public static int randomNAME()
{
	return NAME[(int)(Math.random()*NAME.length)];
}[/code]

Then in npchandler.java add

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1625) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomNAME(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

or item2.randomNAME/ item3.randomNAME depending on which one you used.

Read full topic
